name: about:home DarkBlue
description: " about:home " page with the same color scheme, hover on els & transitions as Firefox DarkBlue.
css:
/* Created  by Antonio Ferreiro "a3c" 13-03-2012 */
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);@-moz-document url("about:home"){:focus,:active{outline:none!important;text-decoration:none!important}a{color:#7878fe!important;background:transparent!important}a:hover,a:active{background:transparent!important;color:hsla(190,50%,65%,1)!important;text-shadow:0 0 0.8em hsla(190,50%,75%,.9),0 0 1.2em #fff!important;-moz-transition:text-shadow .2s ease-in,text-shadow .4s ease-out,text-shadow .6s ease-in!important;-webkit-transition:text-shadow .2s ease-in,text-shadow .4s ease-out,text-shadow .6s ease-in!important}a:visited{opacity:0.8!important;background:transparent!important;color:#5ac85a!important;text-shadow:1px 1px 1px lime!important}:focus,a:focus{background:none!important;color:hsla(190,40%,55%,1)!important;text-shadow:0 0 6px hsla(190,40%,75%,.6)!important}html,body,#searchText,#searchSubmit,button,#snippets{color:#aae!important}html,body{background:-moz-linear-gradient(top,#0f0f0e,#262a31,#0f0f0e) center no-repeat fixed!important;background-color:#0f0f0e!important}#searchSubmit{background-image:-moz-linear-gradient(top,#454e5f 48%,#262a31 49%,#0f0f0e 85%,#303a5d)!important;border:#a7adbf 2px ridge!important;border-radius:4px!important;box-shadow:1px 1px 4px #000!important;text-shadow:1px 1px 1px #000,-1px -1px 1px #b9b9b9!important}button:hover,#searchSubmit:hover,#snippets:hover{-moz-appearance:none!important;border-color:hsla(190,50%,75%,.6) hsla(190,50%,65%,.6) hsla(190,50%,55%,.6)!important;box-shadow:0 1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.1),0 0 10px hsl(190,50%,75%)!important;color:hsl(190,50%,65%)!important;outline:none!important;text-shadow:0 0 8px hsla(190,50%,68%,.6)!important}button:hover,#searchSubmit:hover{background-image:-moz-radial-gradient(center bottom,hsla(190,50%,55%,.6),transparent),-moz-linear-gradient(top,#454e5f 48%,#262a31 49%,#0f0f0e 85%,#303a5d)!important;border-color:hsla(190,50%,75%,.6) hsla(190,50%,65%,.6) hsla(190,50%,55%,.6)!important;box-shadow:0 1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.1),0 0 10px hsl(190,50%,75%)!important;background-color:transparent!important;opacity:1.0!important}button:hover,#searchSubmit:hover,#snippets:hover{-moz-transition:background-color .3s ease,border-color .5s ease,box-shadow .4s ease!important}#searchText{-moz-appearance:none!important;box-shadow:1px 1px 5px #000 inset,0 -1px 1px 1px #454e5f inset!important;background:#223!important;font-weight:normal!important;text-shadow:1px 1px 2px #000!important;border-radius:8px!important;border:none!important;padding-left:4px!important}#searchText:hover{box-shadow:1px 1px 5px hsla(190,50%,75%,.5) inset!important;color:hsl(190,50%,65%)!important;outline:none!important;text-shadow:0 0 8px hsla(190,50%,68%,.4)!important;-moz-transition:all .5s ease!important}#snippets{opacity:.7!important;background-color:#262a31!important;background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(#0f0f0e 50%, rgba(0,0,0,.1))!important;box-shadow:3px 3px 9px #000!important}}
